name: tikkun.io
description: The online tikkun you always wanted, but never had.

scripts.serve: mkdir -p dist && cd dist && python3 -m http.server
scripts.build:css: cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css dist/ && cp -R css dist
scripts.build:data: mkdir -p dist/data/pages && cp -R src/data/pages dist/data/ && cp src/data/schedule.json dist/data/schedule.json
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:data && npm run build:static && npm run build:ts
scripts.dev: npm-run-all --print-label --parallel watch:css watch:data watch:static watch:js serve
scripts.deploy:
npm run clean && npm run build && echo 'tikkun.io
www.tikkun.io' > dist/CNAME && gh-pages -d dist
